headline: Pinned: Charity Match
body:
The Charity Match between Infidels F.C. and Shmuck F.C. will provisionally be held on the 22nd March, at lunchtime on the 3G Pitch.

The finer details are still being decided.
author: Charity Match Organisers

headline: Today's Match: Coming up Infidels F.C. VS Shmuck F.C.
body:
Past match up between the two teams:

Infidel wins: 0

Shmuck wins: 1

Draws: 1



'So today is a big game – we’ve got a lot of proving to do that we can go out and win this. Its not going to be easy, MetOffice predicts some rain so the conditions are not going to be easy.-Montgomery, Manager

Up the infidels, come on the boys
author: Montgomery, Infidels F.C. Manager

headline: Infidels 0 - 1 Shmucks: The Manager's Reaction
body:
It's definitely not the result we were looking for today. I don't think the score represents the effort the lads put in and I am disappointed in the outcome.

We've definitely got to make improvements on how we approach future games tactically.

With this in mind, onwards and upwards to our next match on Monday.
author: Montgomery, Infidels F.C. Manager
